name: Ninja Ming
description:
【Intro】

A 2D platformer. Becoming a ninja, casting Flash-Skill to move nimbly about, and dodging.

——Story
It has been 3 years since the war was over.
Ninjas disappeared from the world.
They have been living a normal life, and their skills got rusty.

Yet Ninja Ming kept training every day.
A top class mission is waiting for him.

【Skills】

——Skill: Flash


——Skill: Fireball


——And more skills in games for passing levels.
